Entries.98880057/p Wizard/t 600 2000/n WizardsNo: WizardSong/7 6/farmer 8 5 3 Wizard 6 5 1/skippable/pause 1500/speak Wizard "Thank you for coming on such short notice.$0#$b#I have some information that I think would be important to you and your...'axolotl' friend."/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Wizard "Yes, of course I know about the axolotl.$0#$b#I know everything that goes on in this forest.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "To put it simply, that axolotl is not actually an axolotl.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Wizard "Are you really so surprised?$0#$b#I think you and him both figured this was the case all along.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "In actuality, the axolotl is simply a human with a curse put on him.$0"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 1000/speak Wizard "You see, a long time ago, there existed a beautiful kingdom.$0#$b#A kingdom made of gold, in fact.$0#$b#A king and his son were the only members of the royal family.$0#$b#However, the king passed away very suddenly, leaving the role of ruler to his son.$0#$b#The prince was a fair and kind ruler and was loved by most everyone.$0#$b#However...there was one person who did not care much for him.$0#$b#You know this person as 'The Witch', AKA...my ex-wife.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Wizard "I know not why she disliked him. She never disclosed that to me.$0#$b#But either way, she had placed a curse on him, turning him into a 'false' axolotl and wiping his memory.$0#$b#The existence of the kingdom ceased as part of this curse as well.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 28/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Yes, I know it is tragic.$0#$b#The story of the curse has always been in the back of my mind ever since my ex-wife told me about it.$0#$b#I was unable to do anything about it either, as I did not know where the prince had ended up.$0"/pause 500/speak Wizard "But now...you have found him.$0#$b#And I believe I can help undo the curse.$0"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Wizard "Bring him to this tower and we can discuss it further then.$0"/pause 1000/end
